1566570350_1Dssbq2y2JDD14aojGG9RX3d5EPpw.body:
To think the world came from 3 scenarios
1. It came from nothing
2. It always was 
3. A computer simulation

The first makes no sense and even a child can understand this. A cause always has an effect, an effect does not exist unless a cause brings the effect into existence. So this is discarded.
2. It always was, this is lunacy as the universe is known to have a beginning, a creation always has a creator. This 2nd option has no evidence has relies only on philosophy and conjecture. 
3rd, do I really even need to say why this one is stupid?
